 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלָה‎</span>] **verb** ==roast, parch== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלָה‎</span> ***id.*** (rare), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלִי‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew; As ***kalû*** II. I, III. I ***burn, consume*** [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>Suppl. 84</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קלאתם‎</span> ***conflagratio, aestus*** [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>4</sup>; [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>1</sup>; [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>19</sup>; [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>20</sup> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. No 74, 1.20</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fry*** or ***roast*** wheat; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"><img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***burn, fry***, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְלָא‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלָם בָּאֵשׁ‎</span> [[Jer.29.22|Jer 29:22]] (accusative of person) ***he roasted them with fire; Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָבִיב קָלוּי בָּאֵשׁ‎</span> [[Lev.2.14|Lev 2:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) grain ***parched*** with fire; so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלוּי‎</span> alone, as common food, [[Josh.5.11|Josh 5:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלִי‎</span> **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְלֶה‎</span> as noun [[Ps.38.8|Ps 38:8]] my loins are filled ***with burning*** ([[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] ***with contempt***, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קלה‎</span>).
